hadiths.text: Narrated `Imran:I said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! Why should a doer (people) try to do good deeds?' The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Everybody will find easy to do such deeds as will lead him to his destined place for which he has been created

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ}
chapter.eng-name: “And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember….’
